Room.Name: East Hafnia Boulevard/Hafnia Circle Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are near the eastern gates of the City of Hafnia.
Room.LongDescription: A giant arch overhangs the gates of the city. A majority of the city was created by elves when they fled from the dragons hundreds of years ago. Since then, humans have wandered in and enjoyed the hospitality the elves have to offer. Perhaps you can help them reclaim the lost city of Caledonia from the dragons.
